ABOUT_SECTION.TITLE: About FixIt
ABOUT_SECTION.INTRO: FixIt is your trusted partner in connecting skilled craftsmen with clients who need quality services. We've built a modern platform that makes finding, booking, and managing home services simple, transparent, and reliable.
ABOUT_SECTION.MISSION_TEXT: At FixIt, we believe everyone deserves access to reliable, professional services at fair prices. Our mission is to bridge the gap between talented craftsmen and clients seeking quality work, creating a marketplace built on trust, transparency, and excellence.
ABOUT_SECTION.VISION_TEXT: We envision a future where finding the right professional for any job is effortless‚Äîwhere quality craftsmanship meets modern technology, and every service interaction is smooth, secure, and satisfying.
ABOUT_SECTION.VALUE_1_TEXT: We carefully vet our craftsmen to ensure you receive top-tier service every time. Quality isn't just a promise‚Äîit's our standard.
ABOUT_SECTION.VALUE_2_TEXT: From clear pricing to verified reviews, we build trust through transparency. Every booking, every review, every interaction is designed to give you confidence.
ABOUT_SECTION.VALUE_3_TEXT: Your time matters. Our platform streamlines the entire process‚Äîfrom browsing services to booking appointments‚Äîso you can get things done faster.
ABOUT_SECTION.VALUE_4_TEXT: We empower craftsmen with the tools and visibility they need to grow their businesses while maintaining the highest professional standards.
ABOUT_SECTION.CLIENT_FEATURE_1: Easy Discovery: Browse hundreds of verified craftsmen across multiple service categories
ABOUT_SECTION.CLIENT_FEATURE_2: Transparent Pricing: See clear rates and service details before you book
ABOUT_SECTION.CLIENT_FEATURE_3: Secure Booking: Schedule appointments with confidence through our secure platform
ABOUT_SECTION.CLIENT_FEATURE_4: Quality Assurance: Read genuine reviews and ratings from real customers
ABOUT_SECTION.CLIENT_FEATURE_5: Peace of Mind: Every service is backed by our commitment to quality and customer satisfaction
ABOUT_SECTION.CRAFTSMAN_FEATURE_1: Grow Your Business: Reach thousands of potential clients actively seeking your services
ABOUT_SECTION.CRAFTSMAN_FEATURE_2: Manage Everything: Handle bookings, schedules, and client communications in one place
ABOUT_SECTION.CRAFTSMAN_FEATURE_3: Build Your Reputation: Showcase your work, collect reviews, and establish credibility
ABOUT_SECTION.CRAFTSMAN_FEATURE_4: Fair Opportunities: Compete on quality and service, not just price
ABOUT_SECTION.CRAFTSMAN_FEATURE_5: Professional Tools: Access the resources you need to deliver exceptional service
ABOUT_SECTION.CLOSING_TEXT: Whether you're a homeowner seeking reliable help or a skilled craftsman looking to expand your reach, FixIt is here to make connections that matter. Join our growing community and experience the future of service marketplaces.

SERVICE_TAGLINES.Plumbing Repair: Expert plumbing solutions for your home
SERVICE_TAGLINES.Painting: Transform your space with expert painting

SERVICE_DESCRIPTIONS.Plumbing Repair: Get professional plumbing repair services from experienced technicians. We handle all types of plumbing issues including leaks, clogs, and installations with quality guaranteed.
SERVICE_DESCRIPTIONS.Electrical Maintenance: Professional electrical maintenance and repair services. Our certified electricians ensure safe and reliable electrical work for your home or business.
SERVICE_DESCRIPTIONS.AC Cleaning & Service: Expert AC cleaning and servicing to keep your air conditioning running efficiently. Regular maintenance extends the life of your unit and improves air quality.
SERVICE_DESCRIPTIONS.Home Deep Cleaning: Comprehensive deep cleaning services for your entire home. We tackle every corner to leave your space spotless and fresh.
SERVICE_DESCRIPTIONS.Carpentry & Assembly: Professional carpentry and furniture assembly services. From custom woodwork to flat-pack assembly, we deliver quality craftsmanship.
SERVICE_DESCRIPTIONS.Painting: Expert painting services for interior and exterior spaces. Transform your home or office with professional painting and finishing.
SERVICE_DESCRIPTIONS.Locksmith: Fast and reliable locksmith services available when you need them. From lockouts to lock installations, we've got you covered.

ID_VERIFICATION.TITLE: National ID Verification
ID_VERIFICATION.SUBTITLE: Upload your Egyptian National ID to get verified
ID_VERIFICATION.INSTRUCTION_1: Upload TWO clear photos: front and back of your Egyptian National ID
ID_VERIFICATION.INSTRUCTION_2: Ensure all text is readable and the card edges are visible
ID_VERIFICATION.INSTRUCTION_3: Photos must be well-lit with no glare or shadows
ID_VERIFICATION.INSTRUCTION_4: ID must be valid and not expired
ID_VERIFICATION.INSTRUCTION_5: Information on both sides must match
ID_VERIFICATION.INSTRUCTION_6: Do not cover any part of the ID or rotate it
ID_VERIFICATION.VERIFICATION_IN_PROGRESS: Please wait while we verify your identity
ID_VERIFICATION.VERIFICATION_SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Your account is now verified. You'll see increased visibility to clients.
ID_VERIFICATION.VERIFICATION_FAILED_MESSAGE: We couldn't verify your ID. Please review the errors below and try again.

ERRORS.BOTH_PHOTOS_REQUIRED: Please upload both front and back photos of your ID
ERRORS.IMAGE_TOO_LARGE: Image size must be less than 5MB
ERRORS.INVALID_IMAGE_TYPE: Only JPG and PNG images are allowed
ERRORS.BLURRY_IMAGE: Image is too blurry. Please take a clearer photo
ERRORS.INCOMPLETE_ID: ID card is cut off or incomplete. Ensure all edges are visible
ERRORS.NOT_EGYPTIAN_ID: This is not a valid Egyptian National ID card
ERRORS.EXPIRED_ID: Your ID has expired. Please renew it before verification
ERRORS.UNREADABLE_TEXT: Text on the ID is not readable. Please retake the photo with better lighting
ERRORS.MISMATCH_FRONT_BACK: Front and back photos don't match. They must be from the same ID
ERRORS.COVERED_OR_DAMAGED: ID appears to be covered, damaged, or tampered with
ERRORS.POOR_LIGHTING: Image has glare or poor lighting. Please retake in better conditions
ERRORS.MISSING_REQUIRED_FIELDS: Required information is missing or not visible
ERRORS.VERIFICATION_ERROR: Verification service error. Please try again later
ERRORS.NETWORK_ERROR: Network error. Please check your connection and try again
ERRORS.UNKNOWN_ERROR: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again

WARNINGS.EXPIRING_SOON: Your ID expires soon. Consider renewing it.
